name: Triple A @ Trendy Psiri - Art & Nightlife
description: No description found

name: Say Hotel
description: Set in Athens, 700 metres from Goulandris Natural History Museum, SAY HOTEL offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At SAY HOTEL every room includes bed linen and towels. Helexpo - Maroussi is 6.1 km from the accommodation, while The Mall Athens is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 25 km from SAY HOTEL.

name: Best Western Plus Embassy Hotel
description: Best Western Plus Embassy Hotel, combining understated luxury with the comforts of a modern hotel, provides unforgettable moments of pleasure. The hotel has direct access to the Syntagma Square and the archaeological sites of Athens. It is located between two metro stations just three minutes from the stop "Ambelokipi" and five minutes from the stop "Music Hall". Within walking distance of many public transport stations, it constitutes an ideal choice since everything is easily reachable. This is a 4 Star boutique hotel that is centrally located at the foot of Lycabettus Hill, near the American Embassy, the Concert Hall as well as major private and public hospitals. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: The Newel Metaxourgeio
description: No description found

name: Grand Hyatt Athens
description: Grand Hyatt Athens, opened in August 2018, boasts a brand new spa, atrium pool & bar and a rooftop with stunning views over the Acropolis. It features air-conditioned accommodation with elegant furnishings and modern technologies. Facilities include a fitness & spa center and a restaurant. Fitted with contemporary art pieces, each room and suite at Grand Hyatt Athens features a 55" flat-screen TV, work desk and minibar. Each comprises a marble bathroom along with free toiletries, bathrobes and hairdryer. A safe and a 24-hour room service are also included. A laptop is provided upon availability. Extra towels are provided upon request at no extra charge. Guests may taste Mediterranean and Asian cuisine at the on-site restaurants and sip signature cocktails at the stylish pool bar or lobby bar. Early breakfast is offered, while a breakfast box can be provided. The on-site fitness centre is accessible 24/7. Grand Hyatt also boasts a business centre and meeting rooms with state-of-the-art technologies, ideal for private or corporate events. Porterage and turn-down services are included. Athens centre is just a short drive away, while Piraeus Port is a 20-minute drive away. The world-renowned Acropolis is at 3 km. Athens International Airport lies within 32 km of Grand Hyatt Athens.

name: K8 Athens
description: Just a short distance from the sea, this smoke-free vacation home lets you experience it all. With the property's convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the quick 5-minute drive to Syntagma Square or the 5-minute drive to Acropolis.Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Athens by hopping on a metro at either Petralona Station, a short 8-minute walk away, or Tavros Station, 13 minutes away. After you return to this 2616-sq-ft vacation home, unwind in the garden or sip a drink on the deck or patio. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This 6-bedroom, 6-bathroom rental features a dining area, a sofa bed, and air conditioning. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, a microwave, and cookware. And you won't have to pack extra clothes, because you'll have a washer and dryer, too.VRBO

name: Kreoli Suites Glyfada
description: Located in Athens, within 400 metres of Glyfada Beach A and 600 metres of Glyfada Central Beach, Kreoli Suites Glyfada provides accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Certain units at the property include a balcony with a sea view. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Kreoli Suites Glyfada also provide guests with a city view. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Agios Alexandros Beach is 2 km from Kreoli Suites Glyfada, while Glyfada marina is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Live in Athens, Thiseio Historic House
description: Situated in the city center, this welcoming apartment brings all of Athens within your reach. Acropolis is within an easy 14-minute walk and Ancient Agora of Athens is also a quick 5-minute walk away, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Athens by hopping on a metro at either Thissio Station, a short 6-minute walk away, or Kerameikos Station, 8 minutes away. After you return, unwind in the garden or sip a drink on the furnished balcony/patio, and don't forget about the outdoor furniture. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This vacation rental features a living room, a dining area, a memory foam bed, and premium bedding. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as an espresso maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: The Stanley
description: Conveniently located in Athens city centre and just steps from Metaxourgeio Metro Station, Stanley Hotel features a rooftop pool, 2 restaurants and 2 bars, including an open-air bar on the rooftop. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a 24-hour front desk. Featuring modern decoration and earthy colours, the rooms at the Stanley Hotel offer a satellite TV and a balcony. Each has a private bathroom with toiletries and hairdryer. Some enjoy views of the Acropolis. Room service is open daily from 06:30am-01:30am. Specializing in Greek cuisine, Icarus Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The rooftop restaurant serves Mediterranean and Greek cuisine and features panoramic views over the city, the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Guests can relax on the furnished rooftop terrace at the pool featuring views of the Acropolis. Additionally, they can enjoy a cocktail at the adjacent bar area offering a 360° view over Athens. Ermou shopping street is 1 km from the Stanley, while the Acropolis Museum is just a 5-minute metro ride. Guests have access to many beaches within a 30-minute drive. Stanley is located outside the traffic restriction ring of Athens, with a very easy access to National Roads. Athens International Airport is 36 km away. Private parking at extra charge is possible on site.

name: Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens
description: Facing Pedion Areos Park, Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens is located just 400 metres from the Archaeological Museum of Athens and a 5-minute walk from Victoria Metro Station. Its rooftop swimming pool operates on a seasonal basis and offers views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. A fitness centre, a sauna and a hammam are available free of charge. The rooms at Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens boast sophisticated urban design and come equipped with a work desk, a mini bar, a safe and a Plasma TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most units offer views to the park and some to the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast which also includes fresh omelettes prepared on the spot upon request. A grab-and-run breakfast including coffee and tea, fresh fruits and energy bars, is also available between 05:00 and 06:30. The Oak Room Café serves a variety of coffees, teas, drinks and snacks, while the all-day Gallo Nero Restaurant serves Italian dishes during lunch and dinner. St Astra East Rooftop restaurant and bar offers panoramic views of the city lights. Syntagma Square is 2.5 km from Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens, while the commercial district of Athens can be reached within a 15-minute walk. The New Acropolis Museum is at a distance of 3 km. Eleftherios Venizelos Airport is 36 km from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site at an extra charge.

name: Electra Hotel Athens
description: Boasting one of the most central locations in Athens, Electra Hotel Athens is next to Syntagma Square. A 5-minute walk through charming Plaka takes you to the Acropolis. The enchanting rooftop bar-restaurant enjoys Parliament, Syntagma Square and Acropolis views. Recently renovated, the classically furnished rooms come with satellite TV, minibar and work desk with adjustable lamp. The marble bathroom includes a cosmetic mirror, bathrobes and slippers. Guests can start their day with Greek Breakfast served buffet-style at the rooftop restaurant. During lunch time and dinner, guests are invited to taste creative Mediterranean delicacies and selected wines in an intimate environment. Located on the ground floor with Ermou Street views, the bar-restaurant Terra prepares Greek dishes, snack and drinks. Electra Hotel’s multilingual staff are available 24/7. Free WiFi is available throughout. The hotel is perfectly located on the pedestrian Ermou Street, Athens' major shopping street. It is right next to the Greek Parliament and Syntagma Metro Station.

name: Tivoli
description: Conveniently located in the Chaidari district of Athens, Tivoli is set 6.1 km from TEI Piraeus, 7.5 km from Kerameikos Metro Station and 7.7 km from Gazi - Technopoli. Featuring a shared lounge, the 1-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. At Tivoli all rooms have bed linen and towels. Omonia Square is 8.1 km from the accommodation, while National Theatre of Greece is 8.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 39 km from Tivoli.

name: The Koukaki Residence
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include hypo-allergenic bedding, laundry facilities, a freezer, and slippers.Expedia

name: Meni Hotel
description: Set in Athens, within 300 metres of National Theatre of Greece and 600 metres of Omonia Square, Meni Hotel offers accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Meni Hotel include National Archaeological Museum of Athens, Monastiraki Flea Market and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos, 21 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Semiramis
description: Facing a tranquil green park in the Kifissia area of north Athens, the boutique hotel Semiramis is the creation of designer, Karim Rashid. Member of Design Hotels worldwide, the Semiramis ideally combines design, comfort and functionality. Works from the owner’s extensive art collection including pieces by Jeff Koons, Sue Webster and Tim Noble can be viewed at the Semiramis’ bi-annually rotating exhibition in public hotel spaces. All its guestrooms and public areas carry Rashid's distinctive signature. Light pinks and greens, oranges and subtle yellows are reproduced in walls, floors, furnishings and fittings for an energetic atmosphere. Semiramis' global guests may stay in touch with the world or the office - internet TVs complete with cordless keyboards come as standard. The hotel's two-level restaurant and bar, serve contemporary Greek, European and international flavours. The Semiraris is right on Kefalari Square, 5 minutes from Kifissia. It is 10 minutes from the business centre of Marousi and 30 minutes from the centre of Athens.

name: Pi Athens
description: Offering a sun terrace and views of the garden, Pi Athens is located in Athens, 200 metres from Panathenaic Stadium. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Each room includes Cocomat mattresses and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area for your convenience. You will also find a kettle in the room. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find Papoutsanis free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guests benefit from discounted rates at Holmes Place Health Club with access to the swimming pool, the sauna, the hammam and the gym. There is no 24-hour front desk at the property. Museum of Cycladic Art is 600 metres from Pi Athens, while War Museum is 700 metres away. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Melia Athens
description: Located just a short walk from Athens’ attractions, luxurious 4-star hotel Melia Athens features a rooftop restaurant with stunning views of the Acropolis. All guests enjoy free access to its health club, the seasonal outdoor pool and the hot tub. Guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Feature a minibar, satellite TV and marble bathrooms with jet shower cabins. Free 3Mps WiFi access, is provided throughout. On the top floor, is located the air-conditioned health club, which includes a sauna and Turkish steam baths, complimentary for our guests. There is also a fully equipped fitness centre. A seasonal outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor hot tub are also provided. The property facilities include restaurants serving International flavours, cocktails and drinks. The nearest metro station is Omonia square, at 200 meters (5 minutes walk). Melia Athens Hotel offers a variety of dining and entertainment options. Sky Lounge Rooftop Dining Bar, operates mid- April to mid- November, weather permitted, depending on Hotel’s management decision. It is located on the 9th floor, offering Greek modern cuisine and spectacular views.

name: Bmv Apartments
description: Situated 1.3 km from National Theatre of Greece, BMV APARTMENTS offers a garden, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has an oven, a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A a baby safety gate is also available for guests at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near BMV APARTMENTS include Larissis Railway Station, Omonia Square and Kerameikos Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: The Dolli at Acropolis
description: We could go Parthenon (and on) about the views from the Dolli, which we guarantee will elicit a wax-lyrical reaction every time the Acropolis comes into sight. References to this neoclassical, listed mansion’s fabric-shop origins have been woven throughout the interiors, while keeping the palette light, bright, and mostly white. The neutrality inside directs your gaze to the ancient beauty outside, which is best admired from the hotel’s landmark-revealing rooftop, which spotlights one of the seven wonders of the world. Mr & Mrs Smith

name: Divani Palace Acropolis
description: Featuring breathtaking views of the Acropolis from its rooftop terrace, Divani Palace Acropolis offers elegant rooms. It is walking distance from the new Acropolis museum and Herodion theatre. All with private furnished balconies, Divani Palace rooms are decorated in natural colours and feature classic furnishings. They are equipped with a TV with satellite and cable channels, air conditioning and safety box. Most offer spectacular views to the Acropolis and Philopappou Hill. A unique feature of the Divani Palace Acropolis hotel is the ancient ruins of Themistocles wall, discovered in the foundations during construction and tastefully incorporated in the hotel's architectural design. The rooftop restaurant Acropolis Secret is open during the summer season and serves Greek and international dishes. Aspassia, the main restaurant, offers Mediterranean cuisine and American breakfast in a stylish setting. The hotel can arrange a free shuttle bus to Syntagma Square during your stay. The Acropolis Metro Station is within 500 metres, while scenic Plaka is a 10-minute walk away.

name: B4B Athens 365
description: Located in Athens, just 300 metres from Onassis Cultural Centre, It offers modernly designed rooms and studios with free WiFi access. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge and mini bar, as well as an espresso coffee machine. The modern bathrooms come with shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some units offer views over the city and the Acropolis, while some also include a kitchenette. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast served daily at the Roof Garden. Staff at the front desk is available on a 24-hour basis and can provide tips on the area. The Acropolis Museum is 1.5 km from B4B Athens 365 and the lively Koukaki area with its hip bars and restaurants can be reached within a 15-minute walk. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 38 km from the hotel.

name: Athens Odeon Hotel
description: Located in the central Piraeus Street, Athens Odeon offers elegantly decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi access. It is within walking distance from metro stations and Monastiraki area. Athens Odeon Hotel rooms are decorated in warm colours featuring dark wood furnishings. They are air conditioned and equipped with a satellite TV, soundproofed windows and hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a rich breakfast buffet. In the evening, they can enjoy their drink or cocktail on the Odeon Bar. Athens Odeon Hotel is within proximity to the nightlife districts of Monastiraki, Keramikos and Thisio offering a wide variety of bars, cafes and nightclubs.The archaeological site of Acropolis is at 3 km.

name: Civitel Attik Rooms & Suites
description: Civitel Attik provides a comfortable setting when in Athens. It also offers meeting rooms, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. For those travelling with children Civitel Attik offers babysitting/child services. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a private balcony, a mini bar and a refrigerator. Each have slippers, converters/voltage adaptors and a private bathroom with a shower. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. There is a variety of breakfast options available each day. Civitel Attik is an ideal base to explore nearby Syntagma Square, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It is within walking distance of Marousi Metro Station and Nerantziotissa Train Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Athens.Revato

name: Alva Athens Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in Athens, Alva Athens Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The units come with a fridge, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Alva Athens Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Omonia Square, Omonia Metro Station and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 33 km from Alva Athens Hotel.

name: Xenophon Hotel
description: With views of the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill, this 4-star Athens hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony. Kato Patisia Train Station is a 200-metre distance, and offers connection to the metro. All rooms at Xenophon Hotel come with simple wooden furnishings. Each room provides a TV, private bathroom and central heating. Free WiFi access and direct dial line are available. Guests can take their breakfast at the hotel’s dining room. There is also a lounge bar available, serving a variety of hot and cold beverages. Room service is available until 03:00 hours. Hotel Xenophon is located near the centre of Athens. Eleftherios Venizelos International Airport and Piraeus Port can be reached with the metro. Bus stops opposite the hotel and offer access to the National Railway. A limited number of free parking spaces is available right in front of the hotel.

name: Hotel Katerina
description: Situated in the commercial centre of Athens, Hotel Katerina is just 25 metres from Metaxourgio Metro Station and 250 metres from Larissis Railway Station. Its rooms offer free Wi-Fi and free parking is provided. The modern and bright rooms at the Katerina hotel have spacious bathrooms and soundproofed windows. Each is further equipped with TV, minibar, safe and air conditioning. Omonia Square is 500 metres from the hotel and Plaka and the Acropolis are a 5-minute metro ride away. The National Archaeological Museum is 10 minutes away on foot. Hotel Katerina serves a Greek breakfast daily. Visitors have easy access to different areas of Greece, with the airport situated just 40 minutes away and Port of Piraeus only 30 minutes by Metro.

name: Ruby Rooms Kifisia
description: Located in Athens, 5.4 km from Goulandris Natural History Museum, Ruby Rooms Kifisia provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Ruby Rooms Kifisia have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Ruby Rooms Kifisia. Helexpo - Maroussi is 10 km from the hotel, while The Mall Athens is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Ruby Rooms Kifisia.

name: Estia boutique apartments
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a Smart TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Nicola Hotel
description: Nicola Hotel is a quiet, friendly hotel offering free parking and free Wi-Fi, right by Park Dikastirion and close to Athens city centre. The hotel is decorated in the traditional style of the city, and the friendly staff offer Greek hospitality to guests 24 hours of the day. Guests can make use of the computer in the lobby or relax with a drink at the bar or on the open-air terrace. From Nicola Hotel guests can use public transportation links to reach the the National Archaeological Museum, the business centre, shopping area, and trendy cafés and restaurants.

name: Athens Comfort
description: Centrally located in Athens, 500 metres from National Archaeological Museum, Athens Comfort offers elegantly decorated units with free WiFi and views over the city. Acropolis Rock and the scenic Plaka district are 2.5 km away. Fitted with soft colous and modern furnishings, all units open to a balcony, some of which offer views over the Acropolis or Lycabettus Hill. Each features a flat-screen TV, and a well-equipped kitchenette with fridge and stovetop. The private bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Omonia Square is 700 metres from Athens Comfort, while Metaxourgeio and Stahmos Larisis Metro Stations lie within a 5-minute walk. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 35 km away.

name: Novotel Athenes
description: Novotel Athenes is the perfect hotel to live the authentic Greek experience in the heart of Athens. Relax and unwind in one of our 196 rooms. Food lovers will enjoy discovering international flavors at our restaurants. Savor 360° views of Athens and Acropolis from the roof terrace or re-energize in the gym and the outdoor pool during summer. For successful meetings, 8 flexible conference rooms will inspire you. Immerse yourself in Greek culture from our hotel near the city center, museums and monuments.accorhotels.com

name: Athinn Residence
description: Well located in the centre of Athens, AthINN Residence provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace and free WiFi. The property is set 400 metres from Monastiraki Railway Station, 400 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and 500 metres from Roman Agora. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Each room is fitted with a coffee machine, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with an oven. At AthINN Residence each room has bed linen and towels. You can play darts at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near AthINN Residence include Syntagma Square, University of Athens - Central Building and Monastiraki Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Urban Tales
description: Located in the centre of Athens, within 500 metres of Monastiraki Metro Station and 500 metres of Monastiraki Railway Station, Urban Tales offers accommodation with free WiFi. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Square, Omonia Square and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from Urban Tales, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Theoxenia Residence
description: Theoxenia Residence is set in Kifisia, an exclusive suburb in Athens featuring high-end restaurants and boutiques. It offers an outdoor pool and on-site restaurant specialising in Greek and Italian cuisine. Its elegantly designed suites feature free WiFi. Boasting Athens and garden views, every suite at Theoxenia Residence includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Its marble bathrooms are stocked with a bath, while free toiletries are also offered. Air conditioning comes standard. The uniquely designed bar offers a selection of alluring cocktails and Mediterranean specialty wines. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property. The world-renowned Acropolis and its magnificent museum are 12 km away. The Mall Athens and Golden Hall, the 2 major shopping malls of Athens, lie within 4 km and 5 km respectively. Athens International Airport is 29 km away.

name: St George Lycabettus Hotel
description: Nestled against the pine-forested slopes of Lycabettus Hill, the St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel affords breathtaking panoramic views over Athens to the Acropolis and the Saronic Gulf beyond. Guests are also perfectly positioned in the pulsing heart of Athens, just steps away from Kolonakis alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries. Discover our elegant, family-friendly hotel in the center of the city the perfect place to experience all that Athens has to offer!iHotelier/iStay

name: athensvintage
description: Located in Athens, 300 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station and 700 metres from the centre, athensvintage provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Square and Roman Agora. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from athensvintage, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grecotel Pallas Athena
address: 65 Athinas Street And Lycourgou Street, Athens 105 51
description: Centrally located, Grecotel Pallas Athena is next to Athens City Hall. It offers uniquely decorated accommodation with arty details. Facilities include a restaurant and a bar. Omonia Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away. Featuring hand-picked items and individually designed, all air-conditioned rooms and suites of Pallas Athena come with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each has a minibar and a hairdryer, while free Wi-Fi is included. Guests may enjoy Greek and Mediterranean gourmet dishes, prepared with fresh products from the property’s farm, at the restaurant's veranda, overlooking Kotzia Square. A lounge bar serving finger food and cocktails is offered. The scenic area of Plaka, as well as the popular sight of Acropolis and the Acropolis Museum can be reached within short walking distance. The central Syntagma Square is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Peri's Hotel
description: Peri's Hotel features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Artemida, less than 1 km from Bebela Beach. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge and kettle are also featured. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. A car rental service is available at Peri's Hotel. 3rd Vravrona Beach is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Artemis Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 4 km from Peri's Hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Anesi
description: Hotel Anesi is situated in Athens, 4.3 km from KAT Hospital. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Some units include views of the mountain or garden. A TV is offered. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Iaso Hospital is 5 km from Hotel Anesi, while Helexpo Exhibition Centre is 5 km from the property. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 22 km away.

name: Athenaeum Grand Hotel
description: Located in Athens, within a 5-minute walk from the lively Koukaki area, Athenaeum Grand Hotel offers elegant accommodation with free WiFi access and free, on-site parking. A modernly decorated restaurant and a 24-hour front desk are available at the property. The rooms and suites are fitted with hardwood floors, well-chosen furnishings and soft colours. Each comes with a modern bathroom with shower cabin, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units open to a balcony or terrace and some offer views over the Acropolis. A flat-screen TV is available. Extra services include car rental and shuttle service upon request and at extra charge. Meeting facilities are also included on site. The New Acropolis Museum is 1.5 km from the property, while Onassis Cultural Centre is 500 metres away. The National Museum of Contemporary Art can be reached within a 5-minute walk. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 35 km from Athenaeum Grand Hotel.

name: O2 Suites Glyfada
description: Located in Athens, 400 metres from Glyfada Beach A and less than 1 km from Glyfada Central Beach, O2 Suites Glyfada provides accommodation with air conditioning and access to a garden. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers and shower. A fridge is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at O2 Suites Glyfada can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. O2 Suites Glyfada provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Agios Alexandros Beach is 1.6 km from O2 Suites Glyfada, while Glyfada marina is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 24 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Meni Apartments
description: Set in Athens, 500 metres from National Theatre of Greece and 1.4 km from the centre, Meni Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, quiet street views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. A stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at Meni Apartments can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Omonia Square, Larissis Railway Station and Omonia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 30 km from Meni Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
